title: BRIEF-Bridgepoint Education Says Entered Into Agreement With Kevin Royal To Serve As Co's CFO

text:
April 16, 2018 / 11:26 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Bridgepoint Education Says Entered Into Agreement With Kevin Royal To Serve As Co's CFO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 16 (Reuters) - Bridgepoint Education Inc: 
* BRIDGEPOINT EDUCATION SAYS ON APRIL 13, ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT WITH KEVIN ROYAL TO SERVE AS COâ€™S CFO EFFECTIVE AS OF APRIL 16, 2018 - SEC FILING 
* BRIDGEPOINT EDUCATION - JOSEPH D'AMICO, INTERIM CFO WILL CONTINUE WITH CO AS SPECIAL ASSISTANT TO CEO Source text: ( bit.ly/2H28AbL ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
